I feel worthless or like a failure

questions.text: How much energy or motivation do you usually feel?

options.text: A lot — I’m usually energetic
Enough to get things done
Not much — I often feel drained
Very little — even basic tasks feel exhausting

questions.text: How do you feel when speaking in front of a group?

options.text: Comfortable — I enjoy the attention
A little nervous, but I manage
Very uneasy — I try to avoid it
Extremely anxious — I feel everyone is judging me

questions.text: When walking into a room where people turn to look at you, how do you feel?

options.text: Fine — I don’t think much of it
Slightly awkward, but it passes
Self-conscious and unsure of myself
Highly uncomfortable — I want to disappear

questions.text: How often do you worry about what others think of you?

options.text: Rarely — it doesn’t bother me
Sometimes — in important situations
Frequently — I overthink how I come across
Very frequently — it affects most of my social interactions

questions.text: How do you respond after making a small social mistake (like mispronouncing a word)?

I feel a bit embarrassed but get over it

questions.text: How concerned are you with your appearance in public?

options.text: Not very — I dress for comfort
Moderately — I like to look presentable

A great deal — I obsess over my image

questions.text: How often do you give in to cravings or temptations?

options.text: Rarely — I have strong self-control
Sometimes — I try to resist but slip occasionally

Very often — I give in easily and frequently

questions.text: How often do you act without thinking through the consequences?

options.text: Almost never
Occasionally when I’m emotional

options.text: Very well — I stay level-headed
